txt_en: If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
txt_cn: 你若思想美好，面容就会如阳光般灿烂，看上去永远可爱迷人。
author: Roald Dahl

txt_en: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
txt_cn: 表达尊重最真诚的方式之一就是真正倾听别人说的话。
author: Bryant H. McGill

txt_en: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
txt_cn: 感恩之心赋予过去意义，为当下带来平静，为未来创造愿景。
author: Melody Beattie

txt_en: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate's loot on Treasure Island.
txt_cn: 书中的宝藏比海盗在金银岛上的所有战利品还要多。
author: Walt Disney

txt_en: The only thing I knew how to do was to keep on keeping on like a bird that flew.
txt_cn: 我唯一会的事情就是像只飞鸟一样继续前进。
author: Bob Dylan

txt_en: Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
txt_cn: 拥有希望可以看见他人不可见的，感受他人不能觉知的，并且实现那些不可能的事。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: A multitude of small delights constitute happiness.
txt_cn: 幸福就是许多小确幸的总和。
author: Charles Baudelaire

txt_en: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
txt_cn: 首先让自己保持平和，然后你也可以给别人带来平和。
author: Thomas à Kempis

txt_en: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights.
txt_cn: 真爱都是悄然降临，既不旗幡招展，也不灯火辉煌。
author: Erich Segal

txt_en: Do not look for happiness outside yourself. The awakened seek happiness inside.
txt_cn: 不要向外寻找快乐，开悟之人在内心寻找幸福。
author: Peter Deunov

txt_en: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
txt_cn: 一个人内心有了飞翔的冲动，就不会满足于在地上匍匐。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.
txt_cn: 如果我随心创作，几乎一切都很顺利；如果我靠头脑来创作，几乎什么也做不成。
author: Marc Chagall

txt_en: Without the dark there isn’t light. Without the pain there is no relief.
txt_cn: 没有黑暗，也就没有光明。没有痛苦，也就没有痛苦的缓解。
author: Jenny Lawson
